Body:
s = spectrographs.shane_kast.ShaneKastRedRetSpectrograph()
example_file = os.path.join(os.environ['PYPEIT_DEV'], 'RAW_DATA',
    'shane_kast_red', '600_7500_d55_ret', 'r112.fits.gz')
assert os.path.isfile(example_file
    ), 'Could not find example file for Shane Kast red read.'
det = 1
_, data, hdu, exptime, rawdatasec_img, oscansec_img = s.get_rawimage(
    example_file, det)
bpm = s.bpm(example_file, det)
assert data.shape == (250, 1232)
assert bpm.shape == (1200, 250)
dev_suite_required
